title: Classic Car Brands Quiz
description: Test your memory of iconic classic car brands and their legendary models

questions.question: Which American car brand produced the iconic Corvette, first introduced in 1953?
The 1964 1/2 Mustang was manufactured by which company?
Which German brand produced the iconic Beetle, one of the best-selling cars ever?
The Eldorado was a famous luxury model from which American brand?
Which British brand manufactured the E-Type, once called 'the most beautiful car ever made'?
The 300SL Gullwing, famous for its upward-opening doors, was made by which manufacturer?
Which American brand produced the GTO, often considered the first true muscle car?
The classic 911 sports car has been produced since 1964 by which manufacturer?
Which brand manufactured the Thunderbird, introduced in 1955 as a personal luxury car?
The Miura, produced from 1966 to 1973, is a classic supercar from which Italian brand?
Which now-defunct American brand was known for the Charger and the Challenger muscle cars?
The DB5, made famous by James Bond films, was produced by which British manufacturer?
Which French brand produced the iconic 2CV, known as 'the umbrella on wheels'?
The Continental Mark II, a prestigious 1950s luxury car, was made by which brand?
Which Italian brand produced the 250 GTO, now one of the most valuable cars in the world?
